function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Aggregate data from wearables contributing to improved public health responses.","Impact":"Risk of privacy concerns and misuse of personal health data.","Mitigation":"Implement strict data protection measures and obtain explicit consent for data usage.","Technologies":"Encryption, secure data storage, and data anonymization.","People":"General population using wearables, researchers collecting and analyzing data.","Owner":"Data protection authorities, researchers, wearable device manufacturers."},{"Description":"Use of AI and deep learning for COVID-19 diagnosis and prevention.","Impact":"Risk of inaccurate diagnosis or misinterpretation of data leading to incorrect interventions.","Mitigation":"Continuous validation and refinement of AI algorithms using verified clinical data. Human oversight for decision-making.","Technologies":"Data validation algorithms, human-in-the-loop AI systems, clinical data integration.","People":"Patients being diagnosed using AI, healthcare professionals using AI tools.","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, AI development and validation teams."},{"Description":"Forecasting pandemic spread using AI and data analysis.","Impact":"Risk of overreliance on AI predictions leading to inadequate public health measures.","Mitigation":"Regular validation of predictions with real-world data, human expert input in decision-making.","Technologies":"Real-time data integration, human-in-the-loop AI systems, prediction validation algorithms.","People":"Public health authorities, policymakers, general population.","Owner":"Public health agencies, data analysts, AI development teams."}]}
